gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Raptors 135, Hawks 128
gameRecap.excerpt: The Raptors defeated the Hawks, 135-128. Pascal Siakam recorded 33 points, seven rebounds, and seven assists for the Raptors, while Scottie Barnes (27 points, 10 rebounds) and OG Anunoby (22 points, five rebounds) combined for 49 points in the victory. Trae Young tallied 35 points and 17 assists for the Hawks in the defeat. The Raptors improve to 10-14 in the regular season, while the Hawks fall to 9-14.
